Transposing Trainer

This optional side quest offers you an additional rival who will periodically ask you for an inverse battle. The illusionist Rarai has come to find regular Pokemon battles a bit stale, and wants something exciting to tweak the rules a bit. Indulge her and she'll thank you with useful items or advice!

Versant Megrez
You'll meet Rarai for the first time in Versant Megrez , the mountainous area to the west of Sol City.
Illusionist Rarai
Totemna Lv. 12
Abilities Moves
Magic Guard Rock Throw
Confusion
Harden
Leer
Snover Lv. 13
Abilities Moves
Snow Warning Razor Leaf
Icy Wind
Grass Whistle
Powder Snow
Delcatty Lv. 13
Abilities Moves
Cute Charm Fake Out
Double Slap
Sing
Disarming Voice
Your reward for this battle is a PP Up . Neat!

Argadnel Lake
The next place to look for Rarai is in Argadnel Lake , to the south of Centauri City . Navigate your way across the icy lake, and you'll see her lurking on the north shore.
Illusionist Rarai
Totemna Lv. 18 @ Oran Berry
Abilities Moves
Magic Guard Psybeam
Rock Throw
Mirror Coat
Harden
Snover Lv. 19 @ Oran Berry
Abilities Moves
Snow Warning Razor Leaf
Icy Wind
Swagger
Mist
Delcatty Lv. 19 @ Oran Berry
Abilities Moves
Normalize Fake Out
Feint Attack
Sing
Copycat
Joltik Lv. 20 @ Oran Berry
Abilities Moves
Compound Eyes String Shot
Thunder Wave
Bug Bite
Electroweb
Gropp Lv. 20 @ Oran Berry
Abilities Moves
Oblivious Scary Face
Smack Down
Bone Club
Rage
This time she'll show you a new field move, Electric Terrain ! This move will help you find hidden items in the overworld.

Ligeia Mare
Rarai's next hangout spot is in Ligeia Mare East . Once you've extirpated Team Nova from Sirius Wharf , A surf taxi Pokemon will appear on the southwest corner of the city. Take a ride through some rocks on the south end of Ligeia Mare East , and you'll find Rarai once more.
Illusionist Rarai
Pskulpt Lv. 28 @ Sitrus Berry
Abilities Moves
Magic Guard Psybeam
Ancient Power
Tri Attack
Mana Sap
Snover Lv. 30 @ Sitrus Berry
Abilities Moves
Snow Warning Mist
Ice Shard
Avalanche
Seed Bomb
Delcatty Lv. 29 @ Sitrus Berry
Abilities Moves
Normalize Fake Out
Assist
Feint Attack
Sucker Punch
Joltik Lv. 30 @ Sitrus Berry
Abilities Moves
Compound Eyes String Shot
Poison Jab
Bug Bite
Electroweb
Cyclobber Lv. 30 @ Expert Belt
Abilities Moves
Oblivious Amnesia
Revenge
Smack Down
Bone Club
This time she'll give you an Expert Belt !

Andromeda Villa Pokemon Gym
Your next encounter with Rarai can happen in the fifth Antares League gym, in Andromeda Villa ! Once you're able to enter the gym, head to the nook on the right side of the eigth floor. Like the other battles in this gym, this is a rotation battle.
Illusionist Rarai
Espatch Lv. 40 @ Life Orb
Abilities Moves
Magic Guard Mana Sap
Tri Attack
Psychic
Shear Force
Abomasnow Lv. 40 @ Sitrus Berry
Abilities Moves
Snow Warning Mist
Ice Shard
Avalanche
Wood Hammer
Delcatty Lv. 40 @ Silk Scarf
Abilities Moves
Normalize Fake Out
Last Resort

Galvantula Lv. 40 @ Sitrus Berry
Abilities Moves

Giga Drain
Signal Beam

Cyclobber Lv. 40 @ Expert Belt
Abilities Moves

Rock Slide
Scyther Lv. 42 @ Eviolite
Abilities Moves
Technician Swords Dance
Steel Wing
Dual Wingbeat
X-Scissor
Your reward for this doubly-interesting battle is the coveted Eviolite .

What's Next?
There will be more encounters with Rarai in the future, but this is as far as you can progress with her in the current version. Stay tuned for future updates!
